name: Super Metroid Eleven
summary: Super Metroid Eleven is a ROM hack of Super Metroid created by Metaquarius for the 2024 Metroid Construction Star Base Contest. The game challenges players to infiltrate a star base, steal 14 fuel tanks, and escape.Designed for veteran players, it incorporates advanced mechanics from Project Base 0.8.1, and adds a few interesting twists to the standard Metroid Formula.
